label: G2 Holonomy Group
mathematical_goal: Establish G2 as the holonomy group of the 7-manifold, with proper embedding in SO(7) and branching rules
theoretical_significance: G2 is one of two exceptional holonomy groups (the other being Spin(7)). G2 holonomy on a 7-manifold preserves exactly one spinor, giving N=1 supersymmetry in 4D after compactification. G2 is the automorphism group of the octonions, connecting to the exceptional Jordan algebra and the Monster group. The branching 7 -> 1 + 3 + 3bar under SU(3) gives the color structure of quarks.
